programme.desc: The ceremony took place on 25 July in the Estadi Olímpic Lluís Companys. The Olympic flame cauldron was lit by a flaming arrow.

programme.desc: The ceremony took place on Friday 27 July in the Olympic Stadium. The 2012 Games were formally opened by Queen Elizabeth II.

programme.desc: The 2018 Winter Olympics opening ceremony was held at the Pyeongchang Olympic Stadium on 9 February 2018.

programme.title: Beijing 2008 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony was held at the Bird's Next on Friday, 8 August 2008. It was directed by Chinese filmmaker Zhang Yimou.
